mapper.select: select row_id as getRSAId from process.road_side_assistant where integration_id = #{claimId}
mapper.delete: delete from landing.if_auto_vehicle_rsa_claim_ws_rsaservice where par_row_id = CAST(#{rowId} as INTEGER)
mapper.select: select protocol__c as protocol from process.road_side_assistant where external_id__c = #{rowId}
